attributes.action: To make all sanitary products in England free
attributes.additional_details: Because there’s homeless people and people who can barely afford it but they still need to pay for their sanitary products and is not fair!
attributes.background: To make all sanitary products for people who get their period for free as some would not be able to afford it.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund free female sanitary products, such as sanitary towels and tampons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
